long_description: . Author: Molly Absolon. Softcover; 82 pages; color photographs and illustrations. Morris Book Publishing, LLC; copyright 2010. Offers tips on choosing a compass and altimeter, reading a map, plotting a course and using a GPS receiver in conjunction with a map and compass. Packable guide measures 7 x 4.25 in.
short_description: Trailside Navigation: Map & Compass breaks down everything you need to know about using a map and compass into essential, well-organized topics.
